description: Critical Alert received from HP OneView.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewCriticalAlert RFC1213-MIB::sysName s EXAMPLE CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertCategory s EXAMPLE CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertState s EXAMPLE CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertSummary s EXAMPLE CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertResolution s EXAMPLE CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertIsLifecycle s EXAMPLE CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertCreatedTime s EXAMPLE CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertResourceType s EXAMPLE CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertResourceUri s EXAMPLE CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertSourceIPv4Address n 192.168.0.1 CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertSourceIPv6Address n 192.168.0.1 CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertEnterpriseId s EXAMPLE CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertTypeId i 9999 CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertInfo i 9999

description: An administratively-assigned name for this
managed node. By convention, this is the node's
fully-qualified domain name.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::sysName

description: The hardware category for the alert from HP OneView.
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertCategory

description: The state for the alert. For example, cleared or active.
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertState

description: The Alert string from HP OneView.
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertSummary

description: The alert resolution string from HP OneView.
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertResolution

description: The value for the alert lifecycle flag: true or false.
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertIsLifecycle

description: The time the alert was created.
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertCreatedTime

description: The resource type associated with the alert.
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertResourceType

description: The resource URI from the OneView alert.
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertResourceUri

description: The IPv4 Address of the system associated with the OneView alert
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertSourceIPv4Address

description: The IPv6 Address of the system associated with the OneView alert
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertSourceIPv6Address

description: This value specifies the enterprise specific ID of the
forwarded alert.
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertEnterpriseId

description: This value specifies the specific ID or name of the
forwarded alert.
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertTypeId

description: This value specifies all the varbinds of the trap for forwarded snmp alert in Json String format.For RIS alert this field does not contain any value as of today.
variables.name: CPQOneView-MIB::cpqOneViewAlertInfo

description: Warning alert received from HP OneView.
